HEADER.TITLE: Jasmine AI Agents
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: Manage your AI SDR agents. Select an inbox to configure your knowledge base.

CONFIG.TITLE: Jasmine AI Configuration
CONFIG.DESCRIPTION: Configure the AI agent for this inbox.
CONFIG.SYSTEM_PROMPT_HELP: Define the persona and behavioral rules for the agent.

KNOWLEDGE_BASE.TITLE: Knowledge Base
KNOWLEDGE_BASE.DESCRIPTION: Manage knowledge collections for this inbox
KNOWLEDGE_BASE.NO_DOCS: No documents yet. Add your first document below.
KNOWLEDGE_BASE.DOC_CONTENT_PLACEHOLDER: Paste or type your knowledge content here...
KNOWLEDGE_BASE.NO_COLLECTIONS: No collections yet. Create one to get started.
KNOWLEDGE_BASE.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this document?

PLAYGROUND.TITLE: Jasmine AI Playground
PLAYGROUND.DESCRIPTION: Test Jasmine responses in real-time before enabling for customers.
PLAYGROUND.WARNING: Make sure Jasmine is enabled and configured for this inbox
PLAYGROUND.EMPTY_STATE_TITLE: Send a message to test Jasmine
PLAYGROUND.EMPTY_STATE_EXAMPLES: Try: "Hello", "How much does it cost?", "How does it work?"
PLAYGROUND.NO_INBOX_SELECTED: Select an inbox above to start testing
